Name: Megacraft Hentai Battlegrounds
About the game: Megacraft Hentai Battlegrounds is a mega battle royale set in a hot desert. Your plane flies over the entire level. Choose the most convenient place and make a parachute jump. Once on the ground, look for weapons, equipment and everything that will help you survive. Remember, you have very little time, the battle is about to begin! There are many fighters in this desert, but by the end of the round, only one will be left alive. Take an advantageous position and wait for the enemies to come to you. Or vice versa, play aggressively, explore the area and try not to get into the deadly zone, because it is constantly expanding. You have two ways to win this game: The first is to be the coolest and just destroy all the enemies. The second is to carefully explore this huge desert and find ten stunning hentai drawings hidden somewhere here. Everything is in your hands! Main Features A very large arsenal of weapons and equipment. Realistic shooting Various playable characters Atmospheric desert Airdrops Beautiful Hentai drawings And much more!
